mapper.select: SELECT a.mat_lot mat_lot, a.mat_code mat_code, b.mat_name mat_name, c.act_name act_name, a.mat_in_amt mat_in_amt, d.emp_name emp_name, a.mat_ind mat_ind, a.mat_exd mat_exd FROM mat_in a JOIN com_mat b ON(a.mat_code = b.mat_code) JOIN com_act c ON(a.act_code = c.act_code) JOIN com_emp d ON(a.emp_code = d.emp_code) ORDER BY a.mat_ind DESC

SELECT a.mat_lot mat_lot, a.mat_code mat_code, b.mat_name mat_name, c.act_name act_name, a.mat_in_amt mat_in_amt, d.emp_name emp_name, a.mat_ind mat_ind, a.mat_exd mat_exd FROM mat_in a JOIN com_mat b ON(a.mat_code = b.mat_code) JOIN com_act c ON(a.act_code = c.act_code) JOIN com_emp d ON(a.emp_code = d.emp_code)
AND a.mat_code LIKE '%' || #{materialCode} || '%'
AND a.act_code LIKE '%' || #{accountCode} || '%'
AND a.mat_ind >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND a.mat_ind <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY a.mat_ind DESC
